Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.card.face.placement

Class PlacementConstraint

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.card.face.placement.PlacementConstraint
public class PlacementConstraint extends Object
PlacementConstraint represents the amount of resources necessary to place a card inside a PlayArea
